quote.request.subtitle: To request a quotation, simply fill in your quote requirements on the form below. Once submitted, your quotation will be processed and you will be able to access your quotes in the quotation manager in your account.
quote.request.helper.name: Your name*
quote.request.requirements.title: Quotation requirements
quote.request.error.msg: Please update the required fields highlighted in red.
quote.request.is.tender: Is this quotation part of a tender process?
quote.request.confirmation: Thank you, your quotation request has been received and is now being processed. We will contact you as soon as possible.
quote.request.helper.first.name: First Name
quote.request.helper.last.name: Last Name
quote.resubmit.link.tooltip: To generate a new copy of this quotation, click the 'Resubmit' link.
quote.resubmitted.link.tooltip: Quotation resubmitted. Once processed, a new quote reference will be generated.
quote.resubmit.error: We seem to be having difficulty processing your request at this time. Please try again or contact our customer service team.
quote.limit.message: Your daily quotation limit has been reached, this request has not been submitted. Please try and resubmit the quotation request tomorrow.
quote.resubmit.error.title: Quotation Request Failed
quote.limit.message.title: Daily quote limit reached
